description: A multiapp, JSON script-based updater for Nintendo 3DS
title: Universal-Updater
author: Universal-Team
long_description:
Universal-Updater is a homebrew app that allows easy installation and updating of other 3DS homebrew!

Some features include:
- Flexible and easy to make scripts
- Pre-made scripts that anyone can submit available for download from within the app
- Translated to English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Lithuanian, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish
- Customizable interface colors
- Get some useful Homebrew apps thanks to the TinyDB implementation

![The main menu](https://universal-team.net/images/universal-updater/mainMenu.png)

description: An updater for TWiLight Menu++
title: TWiLight Menu++ Updater
author: RocketRobz

description: A Card game for Nintendo 3DS & DS(i)!
title: 3DEins
author: Universal-Team
long_description:
3DEins is a Cardgame for Nintendo 3DS. It's basically an UNO clone.

It currently includes:
- Multi Player on one console
- Customizable Cards & Characters
- Translated to English, French, German, Japanese, Russian, and Spanish
- Customizable interface colors

![The main menu](https://universal-team.net/images/3deins/mainMenu.png)

description: A Connect-Four clone for Nintendo 3DS.
title: 3DVier
author: Universal-Team

description: Work in progress Animal Crossing: New Leaf save manager & editor for the Nintendo 3DS!
title: LeafEdit
author: Universal-Team
long_description:
LeafEdit is a work in progress Animal Crossing: New Leaf save manager and editor for the Nintendo 3DS!

Features include:
- Changing player info such as name, tan, and money
- See the Items on your Pocket and Dresser
- See the Villager and replace them
- Editing the layout of your village [Experimental, because it can break your save easilly!!]

![The game selection menu](https://universal-team.net/images/leafedit/gameSelection.png)

author: Universal-Team
title: Universal-Edit
description: A universally good TextEditor! :)

version_title: Easy config access, favorite folders, and various bug fixes
description: A Pokémon Bank for the 3rd through 5th generation Pokémon games for the Nintendo DS(i).
title: pkmn-chest
author: Universal-Team
long_description:
Pokémon Chest is an app for the DS(i) that can store and edit Pokémon in the DS Pokémon games.

It's current features include:
- Loading save files from DSi SD, Flashcard SD, and retail cartridges
- Storing up to 50 (flashcards) or 500 (DSi/3DS) boxes of Pokémon per chest with support for multiple chests
- Editing most Pokémon, trainer, and other save data
- Editing items in the bag
- Injecting pk* files from SD
- Dumping Pokémon to pk* files
- Translated to Chinese, English, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean*, Lithuanian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish

![A storage box](https://universal-team.net/images/pkmn-chest/box-2.png) ![editing a Pokémon](https://universal-team.net/images/pkmn-chest/summary.png)

description: Open-Source lookalike of nocash’s Unlaunch.dsi
title: Relaunch
author: Universal-Team

description: A GBA hypervisor for DS. (like nintendont for gc on wii)
author: Gericom
title: GBARunner2

description: GodMode9i Explorer - A full access file browser for the Nintendo DS and DSi consoles :godmode:
title: GodMode9i
author: DS-Homebrew
long_description:
Features:
- Dump GameBoy Advance cartridges on the original Nintendo DS and Nintendo DS Lite consoles.
- Dump Nintendo DS/DSi cartridges on Nintendo DSi and Nintendo 3DS consoles (if GodMode9i is ran on the console SD card).
- Copy, move, delete, rename files/folders and create folders.
- Mount the NitroFS of .nds files.
- Browse files on supported flashcards when running GM9i from the NAND or SD Card. (`AceKard 2(i)` & `R4 Ultra (r4ultra.com)`)

![The file list](https://gbatemp.b-cdn.net/attachments/snap_191132-png.195368)
